TextView.android:text: “Everything Is Connected” Who doesn’t have a little detective inside? Well, we provide you a chance to live the life of that detective for a day. Give your brain a strenuous mission to unravel the mystery of a crime because its time you stop seeing and reading that fiction. It’s time to be the Sherlock of that fiction. CSI 3.0-GNDEC is striking back this Atharva-2015 with more thought provoking, impudent, crooked and filthy crimes to decipher. It’s time to catch the delinquent and castigate him!
Round-1 (Villainy Inquisition) It’s a pen and paper based round. Participants will have to disentangle the enigma to advance to the next round.

Round -2 ( Charade Jack!) Finalists have to reach the delinquent by solving a series of questions and collecting traces from all over the vicinity. The first team to come up with the correct offender is declared as the winner.

Maximum 2 members can participate in a team. No single entries will be allowed. - A team may comprise of participants from two different colleges. - Once registration is done no change in team will be entertained
